title: Picture Me This
description: "One snap with the shutter of my camera, and you will be mine forever," he whispered.My name is Sam, short for Samantha. I’m regular, boring and plain. The only time I can ever relax during my time in college is in photography class, or at least… It was.That all changed when I met my new photography teacher. He is too sexy for his own good, and his mind too twisted for words to describe.Together we tumbled into darkness, slowly spiralling out of control, and honestly...? I think I like it.
author: Marina Lovechild
